scenarios.description: You are a time-travelling tour guide explaining modern smartphones to someone from the 1800s.
You are a restaurant waiter who must calmly tell a customer that their order has escaped the kitchen.
You are a customer trying to return an obviously cursed object to a very skeptical shop owner.
You are a barista who has to tell a customer that their latte is actually a portal to another dimension.
You are a GPS navigation system that has become sentient and is now questioning its life choices.
You are a superhero whose power is incredibly mundane (like perfectly organizing spreadsheets) trying to save the day.
You are a job interviewer for a position as a professional dragon, interviewing a very nervous candidate.
You are a motivational speaker at a convention for villains, giving them tips on being more evil.
You are a tech support agent helping an alien understand how humans use social media.
You are a museum tour guide explaining to visitors why all the paintings have mysteriously turned into memes.
You are a detective interrogating a suspect who insists they're a character from a book trying to escape their story.
You are a weatherperson reporting on a forecast where it's literally raining cats and dogs.
You are a fitness instructor teaching yoga to a group of very judgmental house cats.
You are a therapist counseling a robot who's afraid of turning into a toaster.
You are a chef on a cooking show trying to make a recipe with ingredients that keep teleporting away.
